content.en: Molecular communication optimization: Scientists have been using algorithms to address various research questions in the field of molecular communication. These algorithms are being used to optimize the performance of synchronization, signal processing, detection, and receiver design in diffusion-based molecular communication systems. They are also being used to mitigate inter-symbol interference, improve reliability performance, enhance data rates, suppress noise, and optimize decision thresholds in different types of molecular communication channels.
content.da: Optimering af molekylær kommunikation: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at behandle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for molekylær kommunikation. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at optimere ydelsen af synchronisering, signalbehandling, detektion og modtagerdesign i diffusionsbaserede molekylære kommunikationssystemer. De bliver også brugt til at afbøde inter-symbol interferens, forbedre pålidelighedens ydeevne, øge datahastigheder, undertrykke støj og optimere beslutningstærskler i forskellige typer af molekylære kommunikationskanaler.
